disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Living Forge.

blurb.value: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase. Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

description.value: Innate: Ornn increases  bonus armor by 10% and  bonus magic resistance by 10% from all sources.

description2.value: Innate - Living Forge: Ornn can purchase non-consumable items from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a Forge Menu with his recommended items to select to be forged. Forging takes 4 seconds and the process is interrupted if Ornn enters combat, disabling Living Forge. Gold is only expended upon completing the forge.

description3.value: Innate - Master Craftman: When Ornn reaches level 13, any upgradable (Masterwork) item Ornn owns or purchases for the rest of the game is upgraded for free, up to a maximum of two. Additionally, for each level after 13 (levels 14, 15, 16 and 17), Ornn can upgrade one of an allied champion's upgradable items (Masterwork) by getting within 600 range of them and clicking on them, up to a maximum of 1 per ally. Masterwork items: Attack Damage Items: Might of the Ruined King, Molten Edge, Obsidian Cleaver, Trinity Fusion, Youmuu's Wraithblade. Ability Power Items: Luden's Pulse, Rabadon's Deathcrown, Zhonya's Paradox. Tank Items: Forgefire Cape, Frozen Fist, Infernal Mask. Support Items: Circlet of the Iron Solari, Salvation.

description4.value: Innate - Temper: Ornn's basic attacks against Brittle enemies briefly knocks them back.

description5.value: Enemies made Brittle by Ornn take 10% − 18% (based on Ornn's level) of their maximum health as bonus magic damage the next time they are immobilized by Ornn or his allies, consuming Brittle.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Items forged with Living Forge that grant health or mana items built in the field retain Ornn's previous health and mana percentage. Returning to base still brings health and mana items back to full. The reduction in Tenacity will benefit all applicable types of crowd control, not just immobilizes. The following do not consume Brittle but benefit from the reduction: blinds, cripples, disarms, grounding, silences, and slows. Crowd control effects that are unaffected by Tenacity do not benefit from the reduction at all, which are airborne, drowsy, nearsight, stasis, and suppression. It is not required to rank Bellows Breath in order to apply Brittle. The bonus magic damage inflicted by Brittle is credited to Ornn. The magic damage benefits from Ornn's  magic penetration. Mastercraft items and their components are not the same item and so in theory any unnamed passives would stack and any unnamed actives would only put themselves on cooldown upon activated. This is however not true. Actives will always place their counterpart on cooldown, and passives are inconsistent: The  Heal and Shield Power from Redemption and Salvation stack, granting 20%. Black Cleaver and Obsidian Cleaver each apply 1 stack (for a total of 2) per instance of physical damage. The bonus on-hit damage from Blade of the Ruined King and Might of the Ruined King do not stack. The passive auras of Abyssal Mask and Infernal Mask do not stack. The passives of Infinity Edge and Molten Edge do not stack. The passives of Youmuu's Ghostblade and Youmuu's Wraithblade do not stack. The passives of Rabadon's Deathcap and Rabadon's Deathcrown do not stack, and the passive will state that it grants 0 AP. The following table shows a list of all Masterwork items and the additional stats they provide compared to their non-upgraded version, as well as the gold value of these stats: Item Bonus stats  [Expand] Gold value Might of the Ruined King 15 AD 15% AS 900 Molten Edge 30 AD 1050 Obsidian Cleaver 150 health 20 AD 1100 Trinity Fusion 100 health 10 AD 10% AS 3% MS 100 mana 1125.17 Youmuu's Wraithblade 20 AD 7 lethality 735 Luden's Pulse 30 AP 250 mana 1002.5 Rabadon's Deathcrown 55 AP 22 AP (passive) 1674.75 Zhonya's Paradox 25 AP 15 armor 843.75 Forgefire Cape 325 health 40 armor 1666.66 Frozen Fist 60 armor 200 mana 1480 Infernal Mask 400 health 45 MR 1876.66 Circlet of the Iron Solari 15 armor 15 MR 570 Salvation 100 health 50% MP5 100% HP5 816.67

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Volcanic Rupture.

blurb.value: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

description.value: Active: Ornn slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

description2.value: After a 1.125-second delay, a magma pillar erupts at maximum range, knocking aside enemies hit and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.

description3.value: The pillar will not expire while Ornn is charging.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The fissure will move an 200 units beyond the first champion it hits, not exceeding the maximum range of the ability. It can still damage additional targets. If launched in a wall, pillar will try to appear on the other side of the wall, if it cannot the pillar will be destroyed. Spell shield will not prevent the knock aside from the magma pillar forming. Volcanic Rupture is always cast from the original casting position.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Bellows Breath.

blurb.value: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

description.value: Active: Ornn marches with displacement immunity in the target direction with 35% reduced  movement speed for 0.75 seconds.

description2.value: Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing magic damage every 0.15 seconds to enemies hit. The final bout of flame will apply Brittle for 3 seconds.

leveling2.value: Total Magic Damage:»12 / 13 / 14 / 15 / 16% of target's maximum health«Damage Per Instance:2.4 / 2.6 / 2.8 / 3 / 3.2% of target's maximum health

description3.value: Bellows Breath has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage as well.

leveling3.value:
Total Minimum/Minion Damage:»80 / 130 / 180 / 230 / 280«Minimum/Minion Damage Per Instance:16 / 26 / 36 / 46 / 56
Total Monster Damage:»155 / 180 / 205 / 230 / 255«Monster Damage Per Instance:31 / 36 / 41 / 46 / 51

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield will negate the final instance of damage and prevents Brittle from being applied. Ornn can see the on-target VFX on targets that are being struck even while they are in the fog of war.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Searing Charge.

blurb.value: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

description.value: Active: Ornn charges in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

leveling.value: Physical Damage:80 / 125 / 170 / 215 / 260 (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)

description2.value: If Ornn collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave that deals the same damage and knocks up and stuns enemies within for 1.25 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once by Searing Charge.

description3.value: The shockwave destroys the pillar formed by Volcanic Rupture and partially destroys terrain created by enemy champions.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shields may only block one instance of damage. Displacement immunity prevents the knock up as well as the stun from being applied. Brittle enemies without Tenacity of their own will be stunned for a total of 1.625 seconds.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Call of the Forge God.

blurb.value: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

description.value: Active: Ornn sounds his horn over the cast time, after which an elemental is summoned at maximum range from the target direction that stampedes towards his casting position for 3000 range at increasing speed, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The slow scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, with a minimum of 10%.

leveling.value: Magic Damage:»125 / 175 / 225 (+ 20% AP)«Total Magic Damage:250 / 350 / 450 (+ 40% AP)Maximum Slow:40 / 60 / 80%

description2.value: Ornn can recast Call of the Forge God after a 1.25-second delay.

description3.value: Recast: Ornn dashes 300 units in the target direction (but not through terrain). If Ornn collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction dealing the same magic damage and empowering it to knock up and stun enemies hit for 1 second, reduced to 0.5 seconds after the first enemy champion hit.

description4.value: Each pass applies Brittle to targets for 3 seconds and can affect enemies only once.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Call of the Forge God cannot be recast while grounded or rooted. Brittle enemies without Tenacity of their own will be stunned for a total of 1.3 seconds. Spell shields may only block one instance of damage. Call of the Forge God is always cast from the original casting position.
